meanings.sent1: Each minute will elapse slowly during the test.
meanings.sent2: Time will elapse quickly when you are having fun.
meanings.sent3: I set a timer to see how long it would elapse before the cookies were ready.
meanings.sent4: The hours seemed to elapse like a river flowing steadily.
meanings.sent5: The days elapse like sand slipping through an hourglass.
